results.description_highlighted:
...Sujatha - a legendary writer whose works can never be ignored. A man who blended science and literature to present us with several novel wonders. In his 4-decade writing career, he shaped the thoughts of young and bold minds with his unique writing style. Though he is no more with us, his words are still alive, and the host Chithrakavi gives it a new form through this podcast.

This Podcast is a production of ClockVoice Media.
results.description_original:

Though he is no more with us, his words are still alive, and the host Chithrakavi gives it a new form through this podcast.

This Podcast is a production of ClockVoice Media.

results.description_original:
UNAKAGA ORUVAN - (Tamil podcast)presents you Informative contents,Story telling,Positive approach to the problems,Social awareness.I love to keep connected with the people,sharing my thoughts and views about this given life.
Most important things in our lives are invisible.The air we breathe,Our mins,Our future,Our love,Our trusts are not seen,but we can feel it.Stay Connected.
Mail id: dhineshmoorthis@gmail.com

Follow me on:
Facebook : www.fb.me/UnakagaOruvanOfficial
Instagram: www.instagram.com/Unakaga.Oruvan
Youtube: www.youtube.com/UnakagaOruvan
